sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import BookShelfChanger from './BookShelfChanger' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' class ListBooks extends Component { static propTypes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired }; render() { let currentlyReading; let wantToRead; let read; currentlyReading = this.props.books.filter(book => { return book.shelf === "currentlyReading"; }); wantToRead = this.props.books.filter(book => { return book.shelf === "wantToRead" }); read = this.props.books.filter(book => { return book.shelf == "read" }); console.log(wantToRead, read); return

MyReads

    Harper Lee

    David McCullough
  2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
    J.K. Rowling

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
{/**/}
} } export default ListBooks;
